descriptionHtml:
Female companion \\ follower that levels as a combat nightingale with mercer fay melee combat style. Faye should be placed at Jorrvaskr in Whiterun. In concept she\'s the little sister to nightingale Cindy - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19015   Both NPC\'s should be marriageable in addition to being a follower. Faye was originally going to be a ranged NPC but after reading some of the NPC range restrictions weapon wise I opted to have her also be dual wielding melee for combat style.  

Updated version of faye is loaded to the bannered mare inn (height was increased from 90 to 94,  mouth was lowered and the nose was made longer)

Mods used during creation:
Better Females by Bella - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
Pretty Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887
Enhanced Character Edit - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951
ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666	
Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1  -  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554

Armors used in the images is
HENTAIGALE Armor by Hentai -CBBE3- By Nausicaa  - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12559

Mesh 00010000.nif and Texture 00010000.dds are included in the rar file and should be placed in the BBLS_Faye.esp folder in the texture and meshes path.
author: Zexiv
